parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.68

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enables or disables disassembly of static weapons. Could be applied to local [[player]], to another unit or to static weapon directly.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''enableWeaponDisassembly''' enable

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]] - [[false]] to prevent local [[player]] from being able to disassemble static weapons

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> entity '''enableWeaponDisassembly''' enable

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> entity: [[Object]] - unit or static weapon
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]]  - [[false]] to prevent a unit from being able to disassemble static weapons, or to prevent a static weapon from being disassembled by anyone

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> [[enableWeaponDisassembly]] [[false]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code> soldier1 [[enableWeaponDisassembly]] [[false]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code> mortar1 [[enableWeaponDisassembly]] [[false]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[weapons]], [[action]], [[inGameUISetEventHandler]]
</value></part></template></root>
